name: Approach Alternate Database Index
summary: An OYX file is an alternate index file used by Lotus Approach, a desktop database application developed by Lotus Software. It serves as a backup to the main index file ( .ADX file) and allows the program to continue accessing database records if the primary index becomes damaged or unreadable. OYX files are typically created automatically by Lotus Approach and are stored alongside the database.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
